snippet: Gov. John Kitzhaber is facing two recall efforts, demands for his resignation, an ethics inquiry into the business dealings of his fiancée and now a criminal investigation.
abstract: String of scandals bedevils Oregon Gov John Kitzhaber as he begins unprecedented fourth term; his litany of problems includes questions about propriety of business dealings of his fiancee Cylvia Hayes, two petition attempts to recall him, and several newspapers calling for his resignation.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kitzhaber is facing two recall efforts, demands for his resignation, an ethics inquiry into the business dealings of his fiancée and now a criminal investigation.

headline.seo: ‘Kitzhaber Fatigue’ Sets In Over Oregon Governor
headline.main: Love and Politics Collide as Scandals Plague Oregon’s Fourth-Term Governor
headline.print_headline: Love and Politics Collide as Scandals Plague Oregon’s Fourth-Term Governor
